thread.title: Convenient, Clean, Comfortable...
thread.title_full: Convenient, Clean, Comfortable... - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jane0061
title: Convenient, Clean, Comfortable...
text:
We arrived mid day and were able to check in quickly at that time. Friendly staff, clean room, comfortable bed, great location 10 minute walk from Times Square. The little coffee shop in the lobby was great in the morning for good coffee, muffins and fruit to get you started. I'd recommend it.
Room Tip: front of building is on 7th Ave might be more street noise on that side....we were on 16th floor and... See more room tips
